item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World!! Have not set-up a new blog in more than a decade and I havenâ€™t written a public blog post in more than 5 years. I can finally cross a dangling item in my to do list and I hope I can be disciplined enough to write regularly. Years and years of consuming text and never producing any does not seem right.
